ComicInfo.Title: War! 'Bots!, Part 2: Isolation and Immolation; Tales of ZBR: The Light That Dimmed!; Angus: Zombie-vs-Robot Fighter
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ryall and Fuso continue the feature-length “War! ‘Bots!” with the return of a familiar, albeit damaged, face! And another bonus ZvR prose story is included, too!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ashley Wood | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Antonio Fuso (a) & Stefano Simeone (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-06 18:30:09. [CVDB501635]
ComicInfo.Writer: Ashley Wood, Chris Ryall, Nancy A. Collins
ComicInfo.Penciller: Antonio Fuso, Ashley Wood, Fabio Listrani
ComicInfo.Inker: Antonio Fuso, Ashley Wood, Fabio Listrani
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Antonio Fuso, Ashley Wood, Stefano Simeone
ComicInfo.Characters: Ann Tran, Finola Moorpark, Fritz Winterbottom, Jenae Jefferson, Jukka Elfson, Phillippe Satterfield, System
